title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 153.6 - Analytical tolerances

For guarantees not listed, the appropriate values shall be
calculated by interpolation. (b) Any commercial fertilizer shall be deemed
deficient if the analysis of any secondary or minor elements is below the
guarantee by an amount exceeding the values in the following schedule: Element
